actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the transfer of a vessel by the Secretary of Commerce to the Superior-Douglas County Museum for use as a maritime museum.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to transfer, without reimbursement, the title and ownership of the ocean tug, Scotch Cap, to the Superior - Douglas County Museum in Superior, Wisconsin.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the transfer of a vessel by the Secretary of Commerce to the Superior-Douglas County Museum for use as a maritime museum.
